The Science of
Conductivity

We utilize electrolytic grade copper with 99.97% purity, ensuring superior conductivity and minimal energy loss. Our state-of-the-art annealing process enhances flexibility without compromising tensile strength.

Our Process

Forged In
Excellence

Every Asian wire undergoes a meticulous manufacturing pipeline, combining heritage craftsmanship with cutting-edge robotics.

ISO
9001:2015
100%
Tested
5+
QA Checks
01

Material Science

Premium grade copper rods selected and rigorously tested for absolute 99.97% purity.

02

Precision Drawing

Copper rods drawn into ultra-fine wires through micro-precision diamond dies.

03

Thermal Annealing

Advanced heat treatment ensuring optimal conductivity and permanent flexibility.

04

Polymer Extrusion

High-grade FR PVC extruded seamlessly for maximum protection and durability.

05

Quality Assurance

Intense micro-testing protocols ensuring compliance with global ISO standards.
